actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Amending rule XLVI of the Rules of the House of Representatives with respect to the number of mass mailings which a Member may make in any calendar year using the franking privilege.

summary.text: Amends rule XLVI of the Rules of the House of Representatives to reduce the number of pieces of franked mail which may be mailed during any calendar year.

titles.title: Amending rule XLVI of the Rules of the House of Representatives with respect to the number of mass mailings which a Member may make in any calendar year using the franking privilege.
